symptoms.name: Other acute signs of neurologic dysfunction

lab_values.SLEV virus, antigen, or nucleic acid: Detected in tissue, blood, CSF, or other body fluid
lab_values.SLEV quantitative antibody titers: 4-fold or greater change in paired sera
lab_values.SLEV IgM antibodies: In serum with confirmatory SLEV-neutralizing antibodies, or in CSF with negative result for other IgM antibodies in CSF for arboviruses endemic to the region

risk_factors: Exposure to mosquitoes (Culex tarsalis, Culex pipiens, Culex quinquefasciatus, Culex nigripalpus)

required: Laboratory evidence of disease (detection of SLEV virus, antigen, or nucleic acid; 4-fold or greater change in SLEV quantitative antibody titers in paired sera; SLEV IgM antibodies in serum with confirmatory SLEV-neutralizing antibodies; SLEV IgM antibodies in CSF and a negative result for other IgM antibodies in CSF for arboviruses endemic to the region)
supportive: Clinical presentation consistent with encephalitis, meningitis, or other neuroinvasive disease
